channel.title: How many players can my computer hold?
channel.description:
Hey I'm hosting a blank Emulous that I've started to code. I haven't really been doing much to it, just be fixing conventions, fixing timers and cleaning it a lot. I'm wondering how many players the server can hold.
My Computer Specs;
Intel(R) Core(TM)2 Quad CPU Q8400 @2.66GHz 4 GB Ram. 500 GB Harddrive.
I thinks that's all you needa know.

item.title: How many players can my computer hold?
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

If you have a shit server, I.E PI, Delta etc. Hardware will only matter up to a point.

Read full topic
item.source: How many players can my computer hold?

item.title: How many players can my computer hold?
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

[quote=“Skyro, post:1, topic:437478”]Hey I’m hosting a blank Emulous that I’ve started to code. I haven’t really been doing much to it, just be fixing conventions, fixing timers and cleaning it a lot. I’m wondering how many players the server can hold.

My Computer Specs;

Intel® Core™2 Quad CPU Q8400 @2.66GHz
4 GB Ram.
500 GB Harddrive.

I thinks that’s all you needa know.[/quote]

About 70-80 I think. It also depends on the internet connection, go to http://speedtest.net and check your upload and download speeds.

Read full topic
